extracted_playbook.title: Avoid opening untrusted files
extracted_playbook.description: Avoid opening untrusted files from unknown sources in affected products to reduce risk.

extracted_playbook.title: Protect network access
extracted_playbook.description: Protect network access to devices with appropriate mechanisms and configure the environment according to Siemens' operational guidelines for industrial security.

extracted_playbook.title: Implement CISA recommended cybersecurity strategies
extracted_playbook.description: Implement recommended cybersecurity strategies for proactive defense of ICS assets, including performing proper impact analysis and risk assessment prior to deploying defensive measures.

extracted_playbook.title: Protect against social engineering attacks
extracted_playbook.description: Do not click web links or open attachments in unsolicited email messages. Refer to resources on recognizing and avoiding email scams and social engineering attacks.
